stories.headline: Don't Trust the Salt: AI Summarization, Multilingual Safety, and LLM Guardrails
Introducing OpenAI for India
stories.summary: OpenAI for India expands AI access across the country—building local infrastructure, powering enterprises, and advancing workforce skills.

stories.headline: Coding Tricks Used in the C64 Game Seawolves
GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics
stories.summary: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

stories.headline: Large Language Models for Mortals: A Practical Guide for Analysts with Python
Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
stories.summary: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.

stories.headline: Measuring AI agent autonomy in practice
Scaling social science research
stories.summary: GABRIEL is a new open-source toolkit from OpenAI that uses GPT to turn qualitative text and images into quantitative data, helping social scientists analyze research at scale.

stories.headline: Beyond rate limits: scaling access to Codex and Sora
stories.summary: How OpenAI built a real-time access system combining rate limits, usage tracking, and credits to power continuous access to Sora and Codex.

stories.headline: Step 3.5 Flash – Open-source foundation model, supports deep reasoning at speed
New York hits the brakes on robotaxi expansion plan
stories.summary: The governor of New York pulled a robotaxi expansion proposal that was viewed as a win for Waymo.

stories.headline: OpenAI reportedly finalizing $100B deal at more than $850B valuation
stories.summary: OpenAI is reportedly getting close to closing a $100 billion deal, with backers including Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank, and Microsoft. The deal would value the ChatGPT-maker at $850 billion.

stories.headline: Current is a new RSS reader that’s more like a river than an inbox
stories.summary: Current introduces a stress-free, totally reimagined RSS news reading app as a one-time paid download.

stories.headline: Sex toys maker Tenga says hacker stole customer information
stories.summary: The Japanese sex toy maker said a hacker broke into an employee's inbox and stole customer names, email addresses, and correspondence, including order details and customer service inquiries.

stories.headline: Reload wants to give your AI agents a shared memory
stories.summary: Reload announces a $2.275 million raise in a round led by Anthemis and the launch of its first AI employee, Epic.
